title: 【跑酷】2D RUN|2D跑酷|欢乐跑酷|1.11.2|THEBLUEMAN003
author: Xiao_Tao_Zi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 像素君 于 2017-8-9 21:27 编辑 


简介 InfoA simple 2D parkour maps made by TheblueMan003. Right click with the mario icon to make your character jump.Can you collect 100 coins.If the character stop moving you have to right click with the door.这是一个很简单的由TheblueMan003制作的的2D跑酷。右键马里奥图标可以让你用你想要人物来跑酷。你可以拿到100个金币吗？如果你的人物停止跳跃的话，那请你右键门。

图片 Pictures





下载 Download原贴：http://www.minecraftmaps.com/parkour-maps/2d-run百度云：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1qY77MtY

replies.author: 酷城
replies.txt_content: 很好，支持一个 要是有幸运方块顶头的那就更有趣了

replies.author: Heganghua
replies.txt_content: 多谢楼主搬运，要是流程再长一点就好了。

replies.author: 冰龙xy
replies.txt_content: 可以楼主，我录完视频发给你链接
